data.title: Official Athletics Website
data.meta_description: The Official Athletics Site for the University of Arkansas. Watch game highlights of Arkansas Razorbacks games online, get tickets to Razorback athletic events, and shop for official Arkansas Razorbacks gear in the team store.
data.text:
SAINT-DENIS, France – On the final evening of athletics at Stade de France, four gold medals and a bronze medal were collected by Razorbacks and members of the Fayetteville pro group in 4 x 400m relay action. As the United States swept the relays to complete the evening, alum Chris Bailey ran the opening leg […]

On the final evening of athletics at Stade de France, four gold medals and a bronze medal were collected by Razorbacks and members of the Fayetteville pro group in 4 x 400m relay action.

Arkansas alum Jaydon Hibbert placed fourth in the triple jump final at Stade de France on Friday evening, missing the bronze medal position by an inch, while Razorback sprinter Amber Anning sped to a British national record of 49.29 seconds in placing fifth in the 400m final on a wet track surface.

Both matches involving Arkansas golfers went to extra holes in the quarterfinal and both matches ended with Razorback wins as Maria Jose Marin and Kendall Todd advanced to the semifinal at the USGA 124th U.S. Women’s Amateur, played at Southern Hills Country Club.

USGA Official Website
